bibl.title: Editing the New Finds: Glimpses from the Correspondence of A.S. Hunt.

series.title: Egypt Exploration Society. Graeco-Roman Memoirs. No.

bibl.note: A slightly different Italian version of the paper appeared as: Bernard Pyne Grenfell (1869-1926) e Arthur Surridge Hunt (1871-1934), Hermae. Scholars and Scholarship in Papyrology = Biblioteca degli "Studi di Egittologia e di Papirologia". 4 (Pisa, 2007) pp. 115-141, fig. X.
